apps.name: Table Habit
apps.subtitle: Your habit growth journey
apps.localizedDescription:
"Table Habit" is an app that helps you establish and track your own micro habit. Its includes a complete set of growth curves and charts to help you establish habits more effectively.

Key Features:
‚Ä¢ Scoring system to help you develop your own micro habits
‚Ä¢ Supports both positive and negative habits
‚Ä¢ Easy-to-use check-in UI
‚Ä¢ Color-coded habits for quick visual distinction
‚Ä¢ Import and export habits using a human-readable JSON format
‚Ä¢ Material You design
‚Ä¢ Optimized for landscape and large-screen devices
‚Ä¢ [Experimental] WebDAV sync support for cross-device syncing
‚Ä¢ No ads

Moreover, this app completely open source.

Got source code from: https://github.com/FriesI23/mhabit
